summary: Raspberry Pi is a line of small, affordable computers created in the UK. They were first made to help teach computer science in schools. These computers are tiny but powerful, with features like HDMI and USB connections. People use them for many things, like robotics, home tech, and hobbies. Due to their low price and flexibility, they became very popular, even beyond schools. In 2015, Raspberry Pi sales beat the ZX Spectrum, making it the top-selling British computer.
title: Raspberry Pi
